member.name: M:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.GridAggregateColumnBuilder.ColumnName(System.String)
member.summary: Defines the column name to display the aggregate value. If `columnName` is not defined, then `field` name value will be assigned to the `columnName` property.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.GridAggregateColumnBuilder.CustomAggregate(System.Object)
member.summary: Defines a function to calculate custom aggregate value. The `type` value should be set to `custom`. To use custom aggregate value in the template, use the key as `${custom}`. Total aggregation: The custom function will be called with the whole data and the current `AggregateColumn` object. Group aggregation: This will be called with the current group details and the `AggregateColumn` object.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.GridAggregateColumnBuilder.CustomAggregate(System.String)
member.summary: Defines a function to calculate custom aggregate value. The `type` value should be set to `custom`. To use custom aggregate value in the template, use the key as `${custom}`. Total aggregation: The custom function will be called with the whole data and the current `AggregateColumn` object. Group aggregation: This will be called with the current group details and the `AggregateColumn` object.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.GridAggregateColumnBuilder.Field(System.String)
member.summary: Defines the column name to perform aggregation.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.GridAggregateColumnBuilder.FooterTemplate(System.String)
member.summary: Defines the footer cell template as a string for the aggregate column. The `type` name should be used to access aggregate values inside the template.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.GridAggregateColumnBuilder.Format(System.String)
member.summary: Format is applied to a calculated value before it is displayed. Gets the format from the user, which can be standard or custom [`number`](../../common/internationalization/#number-formatting/) and [`date`](../../common/internationalization/#number-formatting/) formats.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.GridAggregateColumnBuilder.GroupCaptionTemplate(System.String)
member.summary: Defines the group caption cell template as a string for the aggregate column. The `type` name should be used to access aggregate values inside the template. Additionally, the following fields can be accessed in the template. field: The current grouped field name. key: The current grouped field value.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.GridAggregateColumnBuilder.GroupFooterTemplate(System.String)
member.summary: Defines the group footer cell template as a string for the aggregate column. The `type` name should be used to access aggregate values inside the template. Additionally, the following fields can be accessed in the template. field: The current grouped field. key: The current grouped value.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.GridAggregateColumnBuilder.Type(System.String)
member.summary: Defines the aggregate type of a particular column. To use multiple aggregates for single column, specify the `type` as array. Types of aggregate are, sum average max min count truecount falsecount custom > Specify the `type` value as `custom` to use custom aggregation.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.GridAggregateColumnBuilder.Format(System.Object)
member.summary: It is used to change display value with the given format and does not affect the original data. Gets the format from the user which can be standard or custom [`number`](../common/intl.html#number-formatter-and-parser) and [`date`](../common/intl.html#date-formatter-and-parser) formats.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.GridAggregateBuilder.Columns(System.Collections.Generic.List{Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.GridAggregateColumn})
member.summary: Configures the aggregate columns.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.GridBuilder`1.HtmlAttributes(System.Object)
member.summary: Allows additional HTML attributes such as title, name, etc., and accepts n number of attributes in a key-value pair format.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.GridBuilder`1.Aggregates(System.Collections.Generic.List{Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.GridAggregate})
member.summary: Configures the Grid aggregate rows. > Check the [`Aggregates`](../../grid/aggregates/) for its configuration.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.GridBuilder`1.AllowExcelExport(System.Boolean)
member.summary: If `allowExcelExport` set to true, then it will allow the user to export grid to Excel file.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.GridBuilder`1.AllowFiltering(System.Boolean)
member.summary: If `allowFiltering` set to true the filter bar will be displayed. If set to false the filter bar will not be displayed. Filter bar allows the user to filter grid records with required criteria.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.GridBuilder`1.AllowGrouping(System.Boolean)
member.summary: If `allowGrouping` set to true, then it will allow the user to dynamically group or ungroup columns. Grouping can be done by drag and drop columns from column header to group drop area.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.GridBuilder`1.AllowMultiSorting(System.Boolean)
member.summary: If `allowMultiSorting` set to true, then it will allow the user to sort multiple column in the grid. > `allowSorting` should be true.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.GridBuilder`1.AllowPaging(System.Boolean)
member.summary: If `allowPaging` is set to true, the pager renders at the footer of the Grid. It is used to handle page navigation in the Grid.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.GridBuilder`1.AllowPdfExport(System.Boolean)
member.summary: If `allowPdfExport` set to true, then it will allow the user to export grid to Pdf file.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.GridBuilder`1.AllowReordering(System.Boolean)
member.summary: If `allowReordering` is set to true, Grid columns can be reordered. Reordering can be done by drag and drop of a particular column from one index to another index. > If Grid is rendered with stacked headers, reordering is allowed only at the same level as the column headers.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.GridBuilder`1.AllowResizing(System.Boolean)
member.summary: If `allowResizing` is set to true, Grid columns can be resized.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.GridBuilder`1.AllowRowDragAndDrop(System.Boolean)
member.summary: If `allowRowDragAndDrop` is set to true, you can drag and drop grid rows at another grid.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.GridBuilder`1.AllowSelection(System.Boolean)
member.summary: If `allowSelection` is set to true, it allows selection of (highlight row) Grid records by clicking it.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.GridBuilder`1.AllowSorting(System.Boolean)
member.summary: If `allowSorting` is set to true, it allows sorting of grid records when column header is clicked.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.GridBuilder`1.AllowTextWrap(System.Boolean)
member.summary: If `allowTextWrap` set to true, then text content will wrap to the next line when its text content exceeds the width of the Column Cells.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.GridBuilder`1.ChildGrid(System.Object)
member.summary: Defines Grid options to render child Grid. It requires the [`queryString`](grid/#querystring-string) for parent and child relationship.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.GridBuilder`1.ColumnMenuItems(System.Object)
member.summary:
`columnMenuItems` defines both built-in and custom column menu items.
The available built-in items are, `AutoFitAll` - Auto fit the size of all columns. `AutoFit` - Auto fit the current column. `Group` - Group by current column. `Ungroup` - Ungroup by current column. `SortAscending` - Sort the current column in ascending order. `SortDescending` - Sort the current column in descending order. `Filter` - Filter options will show based on filterSettings property like checkbox filter, excel filter, menu filter.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.GridBuilder`1.ColumnQueryMode(Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.ColumnQueryModeType)
member.summary: `columnQueryMode`provides options to retrive data from the datasource.Their types are `All`: It Retrives whole datasource. `Schema`: Retrives data for all the defined columns in grid from the datasource. `ExcludeHidden`: Retrives data only for visible columns of grid from the dataSource.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.GridBuilder`1.Columns(System.Object)
member.summary: Defines the schema of dataSource. If the `columns` declaration is empty or undefined then the `columns` are automatically generated from data source.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.GridBuilder`1.Columns(System.Collections.Generic.List{Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.GridColumn})
member.summary: Defines the schema of dataSource. If the `columns` declaration is empty or undefined then the `columns` are automatically generated from data source.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.GridBuilder`1.Columns(System.String[])
member.summary: Defines the schema of dataSource. If the `columns` declaration is empty or undefined then the `columns` are automatically generated from data source.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.GridBuilder`1.ContextMenuItems(System.Object)
member.summary:
`contextMenuItems` defines both built-in and custom context menu items.
The available built-in items are, `AutoFitAll` - Auto fit the size of all columns. `AutoFit` - Auto fit the current column. `Group` - Group by current column. `Ungroup` - Ungroup by current column. `Edit` - Edit the current record. `Delete` - Delete the current record. `Save` - Save the edited record. `Cancel` - Cancel the edited state. `Copy` - Copy the selected records. `PdfExport` - Export the grid as Pdf format. `ExcelExport` - Export the grid as Excel format. `CsvExport` - Export the grid as CSV format. `SortAscending` - Sort the current column in ascending order. `SortDescending` - Sort the current column in descending order. `FirstPage` - Go to the first page. `PrevPage` - Go to the previous page. `LastPage` - Go to the last page. `NextPage` - Go to the next page.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.GridBuilder`1.DataSource(System.Object)
member.summary: It is used to render grid table rows. If the `dataSource` is an array of JavaScript objects, then Grid will create instance of [`DataManager`](https://ej2.syncfusion.com/documentation/data/api-dataManager.html) from this `dataSource`. If the `dataSource` is an existing [`DataManager`](https://ej2.syncfusion.com/documentation/data/api-dataManager.html), the Grid will not initialize a new one.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.GridBuilder`1.DetailTemplate(System.String)
member.summary: The detail template allows you to show or hide additional information about a particular row.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.GridBuilder`1.EditSettings(Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.GridEditSettings)
member.summary: Configures the edit settings.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.GridBuilder`1.EnableAltRow(System.Boolean)
member.summary: If `enableAltRow` is set to true, the grid will render with `e-altrow` CSS class to the alternative tr elements. > Check the [`AltRow`](../../grid/row/#styling-alternate-rows/) to customize the styles of alternative rows.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.GridBuilder`1.EnableAutoFill(System.Boolean)
member.summary: If `enableAutoFill` is set to true, then the auto fill icon will displayed on cell selection for copy cells. It requires the selection `mode` to be Cell and `cellSelectionMode` to be `Box`.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.GridBuilder`1.EnableColumnVirtualization(System.Boolean)
member.summary: If `enableColumnVirtualization` set to true, then the Grid will render only the columns visible within the view-port and load subsequent columns on horizontal scrolling. This helps to load large dataset of columns in Grid.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.GridBuilder`1.EnableHover(System.Boolean)
member.summary: If `enableHover` is set to true, the row hover is enabled in the Grid.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.GridBuilder`1.EnablePersistence(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Enable or disable persisting component's state between page reloads.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.GridBuilder`1.EnableRtl(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Enable or disable rendering component in right to left direction.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.GridBuilder`1.EnableVirtualization(System.Boolean)
member.summary: If `enableVirtualization` set to true, then the Grid will render only the rows visible within the view-port and load subsequent rows on vertical scrolling. This helps to load large dataset in Grid.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.GridBuilder`1.FilterSettings(Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.GridFilterSettings)
member.summary: Configures the filter settings of the Grid.

member.summary: Overrides the global culture and localization value for this component. Default global culture is 'en-US'.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.GridBuilder`1.Toolbar(System.Object)
member.summary:
`toolbar` defines the ToolBar items of the Grid. It contains built-in and custom toolbar items. If a string value is assigned to the `toolbar` option, it is considered as the template for the whole Grid ToolBar. If an array value is assigned, it is considered as the list of built-in and custom toolbar items in the Grid's Toolbar.
The following code example implements the custom toolbar items.

member.summary: If `allowGrouping` set to false, then it disables grouping of a particular column. By default all columns are groupable.

member.summary: If `autoFit` set to true, then the particular column content width will be adjusted based on its content in the initial rendering itself. Setting this property as true is equivalent to calling `autoFitColumns` method in the `dataBound` event.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.GridColumnBuilder`1.ClipMode(Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.ClipMode)
member.summary: Defines the cell content's overflow mode. The available modes are `Clip` - Truncates the cell content when it overflows its area. `Ellipsis` - Displays ellipsis when the cell content overflows its area. `EllipsisWithTooltip` - Displays ellipsis when the cell content overflows its area also it will display tooltip while hover on ellipsis applied cell.

member.summary: Defines the field name of column which is mapped with mapping name of DataSource. The bounded columns can be sort, filter and group etc., If the `field` name contains dot, then it is considered as complex binding. The `field` name must be a valid JavaScript identifier, the first character must be an alphabet and should not contain spaces and special characters.

member.summary: Defines the filter options to customize filtering for the particular column. @default null

member.summary: The `filterBarTemplate` is used to add a custom component instead of default input component for filter bar. It have create and read functions. create: It is used for creating custom components. read: It is used to perform custom filter action.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.GridEditSettingsBuilder.Dialog(System.Object)
member.summary: Defines the dialog params to edit.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.GridEditSettingsBuilder.Mode(Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.EditMode)
member.summary: Defines the mode to edit. The available editing modes are: Normal Dialog Batch

member.name: M:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.GridEditSettingsBuilder.NewRowPosition(Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.NewRowPosition)
member.summary: Defines the position of adding a new row. The available position are: Top Bottom

member.name: M:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.GridEditSettingsBuilder.ShowConfirmDialog(System.Boolean)
member.summary: if `showConfirmDialog` is set to false, confirm dialog does not show when batch changes are saved or discarded.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.GridEditSettingsBuilder.ShowDeleteConfirmDialog(System.Boolean)
member.summary: If `showDeleteConfirmDialog` is set to true, confirm dialog will show delete action. You can also cancel delete command.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.GridEditSettingsBuilder.Template(System.String)
member.summary: Defines the custom edit elements for the dialog template.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.GridFilterSettingsBuilder.Columns(System.Object)
member.summary: Specifies the columns to be filtered at initial rendering of the Grid. You can also get the columns that were currently filtered.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.GridFilterSettingsBuilder.EnableCaseSensitivity(System.Boolean)
member.summary: If `enableCaseSensitivity` is set to true then searches grid records with exact match based on the filter operator. It will have no effect on number, boolean and Date fields.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.GridFilterSettingsBuilder.IgnoreAccent(System.Boolean)
member.summary: If ignoreAccent set to true, then filter ignores the diacritic characters or accents while filtering.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.GridFilterSettingsBuilder.ImmediateModeDelay(System.Double)
member.summary: Defines the time delay (in milliseconds) in filtering records when the `Immediate` mode of filter bar is set.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.GridFilterSettingsBuilder.Mode(Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.FilterBarMode)
member.summary: Defines the filter bar modes. The available options are, `OnEnter`: Initiates filter operation after Enter key is pressed. `Immediate`: Initiates filter operation after a certain time interval. By default, time interval is 1500 ms.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.GridFilterSettingsBuilder.Operators(System.Object)
member.summary: The `operators` is used to override the default operators in filter menu. This should be defined by type wise (string, number, date and boolean). Based on the column type, this customize operator list will render in filter menu.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.GridFilterSettingsBuilder.ShowFilterBarStatus(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Shows or hides the filtered status message on the pager.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.GridFilterSettingsBuilder.Type(Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.FilterType)
member.summary: Defines options for filtering type. The available options are `Menu` - Specifies the filter type as menu. `CheckBox` - Specifies the filter type as checkbox. `FilterBar` - Specifies the filter type as filterbar. `Excel` - Specifies the filter type as checkbox.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.GridGroupSettingsBuilder.CaptionTemplate(System.String)
member.summary: The Caption Template allows user to display the string or HTML element in group caption. > It accepts either the [template string](http://ej2.syncfusion.com/documentation/common/template-engine/) or the HTML element ID.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.GridGroupSettingsBuilder.Columns(System.String[])
member.summary: Specifies the column names to group at initial rendering of the Grid. You can also get the currently grouped columns.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.GridGroupSettingsBuilder.DisablePageWiseAggregates(System.Boolean)
member.summary: If `disablePageWiseAggregates` set to true, then the group aggregate value will be calculated from the whole data instead of paged data and two requests will be made for each page when Grid bound with remote service.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.GridGroupSettingsBuilder.ShowDropArea(System.Boolean)
member.summary: If `showDropArea` is set to true, the group drop area element will be visible at the top of the Grid.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.GridGroupSettingsBuilder.ShowGroupedColumn(System.Boolean)
member.summary: If `showGroupedColumn` is set to false, it hides the grouped column after grouping.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.GridGroupSettingsBuilder.ShowToggleButton(System.Boolean)
member.summary: If `showToggleButton` set to true, then the toggle button will be showed in the column headers which can be used to group or ungroup columns by clicking them.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.GridGroupSettingsBuilder.ShowUngroupButton(System.Boolean)
member.summary: If `showUngroupButton` set to false, then ungroup button is hidden in dropped element. It can be used to ungroup the grouped column when click on ungroup button.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.GridPageSettingsBuilder.CurrentPage(System.Double)
member.summary: Defines the current page number of the pager.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.GridPageSettingsBuilder.EnableQueryString(System.Boolean)
member.summary: If `enableQueryString` set to true, then it pass current page information as a query string along with the URL while navigating to other page.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.GridPageSettingsBuilder.PageCount(System.Double)
member.summary: Defines the number of pages to be displayed in the pager container.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.GridPageSettingsBuilder.PageSize(System.Double)
member.summary: Defines the number of records to be displayed per page.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.GridPageSettingsBuilder.PageSizes(System.Object)
member.summary: If `pageSizes` set to true or Array of values, It renders DropDownList in the pager which allow us to select pageSize from DropDownList.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.GridPageSettingsBuilder.PageSizes(System.Boolean)
member.summary: If `pageSizes` set to true or Array of values, It renders DropDownList in the pager which allow us to select pageSize from DropDownList.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.GridPageSettingsBuilder.Template(System.String)
member.summary: Defines the template which renders customized elements in pager instead of default elements. It accepts either [template string](../../common/template-engine/) or HTML element ID.

member.summary: Defines the ID of droppable component on which row drop should occur.

member.summary: If ignoreAccent set to true, then filter ignores the diacritic characters or accents while filtering.

member.summary: If `ignoreCase` is set to false, searches records that match exactly, else searches records that are case insensitive(uppercase and lowercase letters treated the same).

member.name: M:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.GridSearchSettingsBuilder.Key(System.String)
member.summary: Specifies the key value to search Grid records at initial rendering. You can also get the current search key.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.GridSearchSettingsBuilder.Operator(System.String)
member.summary: Defines the operator to search records. The available operators are:

member.name: M:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.GridSelectionSettingsBuilder.CellSelectionMode(Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.CellSelectionMode)
member.summary: The cell selection modes are flow and box. It requires the selection [`mode`](grid/#mode-selectionmode/) to be either cell or both. `Flow`: Selects the range of cells between start index and end index that also includes the other cells of the selected rows. `Box`: Selects the range of cells within the start and end column indexes that includes in between cells of rows within the range. `BoxWithBorder`: Selects the range of cells as like Box mode with borders.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.GridSelectionSettingsBuilder.CheckboxMode(Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.CheckboxSelectionType)
member.summary: Defines options for checkbox selection Mode. They are `Default`: This is the default value of the checkboxMode. In this mode, user can select multiple rows by clicking rows one by one. `ResetOnRowClick`: In ResetOnRowClick mode, on clicking a row it will reset previously selected row and also multiple rows can be selected by using CTRL or SHIFT key.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.GridSelectionSettingsBuilder.CheckboxOnly(System.Boolean)
member.summary: If 'checkboxOnly' set to true, then the Grid selection is allowed only through checkbox.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.GridSelectionSettingsBuilder.EnableSimpleMultiRowSelection(System.Boolean)
member.summary: If 'enableSimpleMultiRowSelection' set to true, then the user can able to perform multiple row selection with single clicks.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.GridSelectionSettingsBuilder.EnableToggle(System.Boolean)
member.summary: If 'enableToggle' set to true, then the user can able to perform toggle for the selected row.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.GridSelectionSettingsBuilder.Mode(Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.SelectionMode)
member.summary: Grid supports row, cell, and both (row and cell) selection mode.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.GridSelectionSettingsBuilder.PersistSelection(System.Boolean)
member.summary: If 'persistSelection' set to true, then the Grid selection is persisted on all operations. For persisting selection in the Grid, any one of the column should be enabled as a primary key.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.GridSelectionSettingsBuilder.Type(Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.SelectionType)
member.summary: Defines options for selection type. They are `Single`: Allows selection of only a row or a cell. `Multiple`: Allows selection of multiple rows or cells.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.GridSortSettingsBuilder.AllowUnsort(System.Boolean)
member.summary: If `allowUnsort` set to false the user can not get the grid in unsorted state by clicking the sorted column header.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.GridSortSettingsBuilder.Columns(System.Object)
member.summary: Specifies the columns to sort at initial rendering of Grid. Also user can get current sorted columns.

member.summary: Defines the `wrapMode` of the Grid. The available modes are: `Both`: Wraps both the header and content. `Content`: Wraps the header alone. `Header`: Wraps the content alone.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.EJ2.HeatMap.DrawType
member.summary: specify the rendering mode SVG - Heat map is render using SVG draw mode. Canvas - Heat map is render using Canvas draw mode. Auto - Automatically switch the draw mode based on number of records in data source.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.EJ2.HeatMap.HeatMapTheme
member.summary: Defines Theme of the heatmap.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.EJ2.HeatMap.IntervalType
member.summary: Defines the interval type of datetime axis. They are years - Define the interval of the axis in years. months - Define the interval of the axis in months. days - Define the interval of the axis in days. hours - Define the interval of the axis in hours. minutes - Define the interval of the axis in minutes.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.EJ2.HeatMap.LabelIntersectAction
member.summary: specify the label intersect action for axis None - Shows all the labels with overlap. Trim - Trim the label when it intersect. Rotate45 - Rotate the label to 45 degree when it intersect.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.EJ2.HeatMap.LabelType
member.summary: Defines the axis label display type for date time axis. They are None: Axis labels displayed based on the value type years - Define the axis labels display in every year. months - Define the axis labels display in every month. days - Define the axis labels display in every days. hours - Define the axis labels display in every hours.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.EJ2.HeatMap.ValueType
member.summary: Defines the type of axis. They are double - Renders a numeric axis. dateTime - Renders a dateTime axis. category - Renders a category axis.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.EJ2.HeatMap.BorderType
member.summary: Defines border type for multi level labels. Rectangle Brace WithoutBorder Without top Border Without top and bottom border Without bottom Border

member.name: T:Syncfusion.EJ2.HeatMap.Alignment
member.summary: Defines the Alignment. They are near - Align the element to the left. center - Align the element to the center. far - Align the element to the right.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.EJ2.HeatMap.TextOverflow
member.summary: Defines the text over flow None - Used to show the heat map text with overlap to other element Wrap - Used to show the heat map text with Wrap support Trim - Used to show the heat map text with Trim

member.name: T:Syncfusion.EJ2.HeatMap.BubbleType
member.summary: Defines Bubble Type. They are Size - Define the bubble type is size. Color - Define the bubble type is color. Sector - Define the bubble type is sector. SizeAndColor - Define the bubble type is sizeandcolor.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.EJ2.HeatMap.CellType
member.summary: Defines cell Type. They are Rect - Render a HeatMap cells in rectangle shape. Bubble - Render a HeatMap cells in bubble shape.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.EJ2.HeatMap.ColorGradientMode
member.summary: Specifies the type of label display for smart legend. Table: Calculated Minimum and Maximum for Overall dataSource. Row: Calculated Minimum and Maximum for Every Row. Column : Calculated Minimum and Maximum for Every Column.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.EJ2.HeatMap.PaletteType
member.summary: Defines Color type for heat map cell. Gradient - Render a HeatMap cells with linear gradient color. Fixed - Render a HeatMap cells with fixed color.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.EJ2.HeatMap.LabelDisplayType
member.summary: Specifies the type of label display for smart legend. All: All labels are displayed. Edge: Labels will be displayed only at the edges of the legend. None: No labels are displayed.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.EJ2.HeatMap.LegendPosition

member.name: T:Syncfusion.EJ2.Maps.ProjectionType
member.summary: Defines the projection type of the maps. Mercator -Specifies the Mercator projection type.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.EJ2.Maps.MapsTheme
member.summary: Defines Theme of the maps. They are Material - Render a maps with Material theme. Fabric - Render a maps with Fabric theme Bootstrap - Render a maps with Bootstrap theme Dark - Render a maps with Dark theme

member.name: T:Syncfusion.EJ2.Maps.BingMapType
member.summary: Defines bing map types Aerial - specifies the Aerial type AerialWithLabel - specifies the AerialWithLabel type Road - specifies the Road type

member.name: T:Syncfusion.EJ2.Maps.GeometryType
member.summary: Defines the geometry type. They are Geographic - Default value of geometry layer. Normal - Normal rendering of geometry layer.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.EJ2.Maps.ShapeLayerType
member.summary: Defines the Layer types. Geometry - Specifies the geometry type. Bing - Specifies the Bing type.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.EJ2.Maps.Type
member.summary: Defines the map layer types. Layer - Specifies the layer type. SubLayer - Specifies the sublayer type.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.EJ2.Maps.MarkerType
member.summary: Defines the marker types. Circle - Specifies the Circle type. Rectangle - Specifies the Rectangle type. Cross - Specifies the Cross type. Diamond - Specifies the Diamond type. Star - Specifies the Star type. Balloon - Specifies the Balloon type. Triangle - Specifies the Triangle type. HorizontalLine - Specifies the HorizontalLine type. VerticalLine - Specifies the VerticalLine type.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.EJ2.Maps.BubbleType
member.summary: Defines the bubble type

member.name: T:Syncfusion.EJ2.Maps.IntersectAction
member.summary: Defines the label intersect action. They are Trim - Trims the intersected datalabel None - Intersection action is not applied Hide - Hides the intersected datalabel

member.name: T:Syncfusion.EJ2.Maps.SmartLabelMode
member.summary: Defines the smart label mode. They are Trim - Trims the datalabel which exceed the region None - Smart label mode is not applied hide - Hide the datalabel which exceeds the region

member.name: T:Syncfusion.EJ2.Maps.AnnotationAlignment
member.summary: Defines the Alignment. They are none - Default alignment as none near - Align the element to the left. center - Align the element to the center. far - Align the element to the right.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.EJ2.Maps.Alignment
member.summary: Defines the Alignment. They are near - Align the element to the left. center - Align the element to the center. far - Align the element to the right.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.EJ2.Maps.Orientation
member.summary: Defines the tool bar orientation

member.name: T:Syncfusion.EJ2.Maps.LabelIntersectAction
member.summary: Defines the label intersect action types

member.name: T:Syncfusion.EJ2.Maps.LabelPosition
member.summary: Defines the label placement type

member.name: T:Syncfusion.EJ2.Maps.LegendMode
member.summary: Defines the Legend modes. They are Default - Specifies the Default mode. interactive - specifies the Interactive mode.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.EJ2.Maps.LegendArrangement
member.summary: Defines the legend arrangement

member.name: T:Syncfusion.EJ2.Maps.LegendPosition
member.summary: Defines the position of the legend. They are top - Displays the legend on the top of maps. left - Displays the legend on the left of maps. bottom - Displays the legend on the bottom of maps. right - Displays the legend on the right of maps. float - Displays the legend based on given x and y value.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.EJ2.Maps.LegendShape
member.summary: Defines the shape of legend. They are circle - Renders a circle. rectangle - Renders a rectangle. triangle - Renders a triangle. diamond - Renders a diamond. cross - Renders a cross. Star - Renders a star. horizontalLine - Renders a horizontalLine. verticalLine - Renders a verticalLine. pentagon - Renders a pentagon. invertedTriangle - Renders a invertedTriangle.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.EJ2.Maps.LegendType
member.summary: Defines the Legend types. They are Layers - Legend applicable to Layers. Bubbles - Legend applicable to Bubbles. Markers - Legend applicable to Markers.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Maps.MapsAnnotation.Content
member.summary: Specifies the id of html element.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Maps.MapsAnnotation.HorizontalAlignment
member.summary: Specifies the horizontal alignment of annotation.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Notifications.Toast.HtmlAttributes
member.summary: Allows additional HTML attributes such as title, name, etc., and accepts n number of attributes in a key-value pair format.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Notifications.Toast.Animation
member.summary: Specifies the animation configuration settings for showing and hiding the Toast.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Notifications.Toast.Buttons
member.summary: Specifies the collection of Toast action `buttons` to be rendered with the given Button model properties and its click action handler.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Notifications.Toast.Content
member.summary: Specifies the content to be displayed on the Toast. Accepts selectors, string values and HTML elements.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Notifications.Toast.CssClass
member.summary: Defines single/multiple classes (separated by space) to be used for customization of Toast.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Notifications.Toast.EnablePersistence
member.summary: Enable or disable persisting component's state between page reloads.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Notifications.Toast.EnableRtl
member.summary: Enable or disable rendering component in right to left direction.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Notifications.Toast.ExtendedTimeout
member.summary: Specifies the Toast display time duration after interacting with the Toast.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Notifications.Toast.Height
member.summary: Specifies the height of the Toast in pixels/number/percentage. Number value is considered as pixels.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Notifications.Toast.Icon
member.summary: Defines CSS classes to specify an icon for the Toast which is to be displayed at top left corner of the Toast.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Notifications.Toast.Locale
member.summary: Overrides the global culture and localization value for this component. Default global culture is 'en-US'.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Notifications.Toast.NewestOnTop
member.summary: Specifies the newly created Toast message display order while multiple toast's are added to page one after another. By default, newly added Toast will be added after old Toast's.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Notifications.Toast.Position
member.summary: Specifies the position of the Toast message to be displayed within target container. In the case of multiple Toast display, new Toast position will not update on dynamic change of property values until the old Toast messages removed. X values are: Left , Right ,Center Y values are: Top , Bottom

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Notifications.Toast.ShowCloseButton
member.summary: Specifies whether to show the close button in Toast message to close the Toast.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Notifications.Toast.ShowProgressBar
member.summary: Specifies whether to show the progress bar to denote the Toast message display timeout.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Notifications.Toast.Target
member.summary: Specifies the target container where the Toast to be displayed. Based on the target, the positions such as `Left`, `Top` will be applied to the Toast. The default value is null, which refers the `document.body` element.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Notifications.Toast.Template
member.summary: Specifies the HTML element/element ID as a string that can be displayed as a Toast. The given template is taken as preference to render the Toast, even if the built-in properties such as title and content are defined.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Notifications.Toast.TimeOut
member.summary: Specifies the Toast display time duration on the page in milliseconds. - Once the time expires, Toast message will be removed. - Setting 0 as a time out value displays the Toast on the page until the user closes it manually.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.EJ2.Notifications.ToastBuilder.Position(Syncfusion.EJ2.Notifications.ToastToastPosition)
member.summary: Specifies the position of the Toast message to be displayed within target container. In the case of multiple Toast display, new Toast position will not update on dynamic change of property values until the old Toast messages removed. X values are: Left , Right ,Center Y values are: Top , Bottom

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.PivotView.PivotFieldListRow.Type
member.summary: It allows to set the summary type of the field. The available types are, `Sum`: The summary cells calculated by the sum of its cells. `Count`: The summary cells calculated by the count of its cells. `Min`: The summary cells shows the value which is the minimum value of its cells. `Max`: The summary cells shows the value which is the maximum value of its cells. `Percentage`: The summary cells displays in percentage format. `Avg`: The summary cells calculated by the average of its cells. `CalculatedField`: It should set to include calculated fields.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.EJ2.PivotView.FilterFieldListDataSourceBuilder.Type(Syncfusion.EJ2.PivotView.SummaryTypes)
member.summary: It allows to set the summary type of the field. The available types are, `Sum`: The summary cells calculated by the sum of its cells. `Count`: The summary cells calculated by the count of its cells. `Min`: The summary cells shows the value which is the minimum value of its cells. `Max`: The summary cells shows the value which is the maximum value of its cells. `Percentage`: The summary cells displays in percentage format. `Avg`: The summary cells calculated by the average of its cells. `CalculatedField`: It should set to include calculated fields.

member.summary: It allows to set the summary type of the field. The available types are, `Sum`: The summary cells calculated by the sum of its cells. `Count`: The summary cells calculated by the count of its cells. `Min`: The summary cells shows the value which is the minimum value of its cells. `Max`: The summary cells shows the value which is the maximum value of its cells. `Percentage`: The summary cells displays in percentage format. `Avg`: The summary cells calculated by the average of its cells. `CalculatedField`: It should set to include calculated fields.

member.summary: If `allowReordering` is set to true, Grid columns can be reordered. Reordering can be done by drag and drop of a particular column from one index to another index. > If Grid is rendered with stacked headers, reordering is allowed only at the same level as the column headers.

member.summary: If `allowResizing` is set to true, Grid columns can be resized.

member.summary: If `allowSelection` is set to true, it allows selection of (highlight row) Grid records by clicking it.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.PivotView.PivotViewGridSettings.AllowTextWrap
member.summary: If `allowTextWrap` set to true, then text content will wrap to the next line when its text content exceeds the width of the Column Cells.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.PivotView.PivotViewGridSettings.ClipMode
member.summary: Defines the cell content's overflow mode. The available modes are `Clip` - Truncates the cell content when it overflows its area. `Ellipsis` - Displays ellipsis when the cell content overflows its area. `EllipsisWithTooltip` - Displays ellipsis when the cell content overflows its area also it will display tooltip while hover on ellipsis applied cell.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.PivotView.PivotViewGridSettings.ColumnWidth
member.summary: Defines the height of Grid rows.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.PivotView.PivotViewGridSettings.ContextMenuItems
member.summary: `contextMenuItems` defines both built-in and custom context menu items.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.PivotView.PivotViewGridSettings.GridLines
member.summary: Defines the mode of grid lines. The available modes are, `Both`: Displays both horizontal and vertical grid lines. `None`: No grid lines are displayed. `Horizontal`: Displays the horizontal grid lines only. `Vertical`: Displays the vertical grid lines only. `Default`: Displays grid lines based on the theme.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.PivotView.PivotViewGridSettings.Height
member.summary: Defines the content height of Grid.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.PivotView.PivotViewGridSettings.PrintMode
member.summary: Defines the print modes. The available print modes are `AllPages`: Prints all pages of the Grid. `CurrentPage`: Prints the current page of the Grid.

member.summary: Specifies the actions like `Hide`, `Rotate45`, and `Rotate90` when the axis labels intersect with each other.They are, Rotate45: Rotates the label to 45 degree when it intersects. member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.PivotView.PivotViewPivotSelectionSettings.CellSelectionMode
member.summary: The cell selection modes are flow and box. It requires the selection `mode` to be either cell or both. `Flow`: Selects the range of cells between start index and end index that also includes the other cells of the selected rows. `Box`: Selects the range of cells within the start and end column indexes that includes in between cells of rows within the range. `BoxWithBorder`: Selects the range of cells as like Box mode with borders.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.PivotView.PivotViewPivotSelectionSettings.CheckboxMode
member.summary: Defines options for checkbox selection Mode. They are `Default`: This is the default value of the checkboxMode. In this mode, user can select multiple rows by clicking rows one by one. `ResetOnRowClick`: In ResetOnRowClick mode, on clicking a row it will reset previously selected row and also multiple rows can be selected by using CTRL or SHIFT key.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.PivotView.PivotViewPivotSelectionSettings.CheckboxOnly
member.summary: If 'checkboxOnly' set to true, then the selection is allowed only through checkbox.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.PivotView.PivotViewPivotSelectionSettings.EnableSimpleMultiRowSelection
member.summary: If 'enableSimpleMultiRowSelection' set to true, then the user can able to perform multiple row selection with single clicks.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.PivotView.PivotViewPivotSelectionSettings.Mode
member.summary: Pivot widget supports row, column, cell, and both (row and column) selection mode.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.PivotView.PivotViewPivotSelectionSettings.PersistSelection
member.summary: If 'persistSelection' set to true, then the selection is persisted on all operations. For persisting selection, any one of the column should be enabled as a primary key.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.PivotView.PivotViewPivotSelectionSettings.Type
member.summary: Defines options for selection type. They are `Single`: Allows selection of only a row or a column or a cell. `Multiple`: Allows selection of multiple rows or columns or cells.

member.summary: To get or set value for ContentTemplate.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.EJ2.PivotView.PivotViewRowBuilder.Type(Syncfusion.EJ2.PivotView.SummaryTypes)
member.summary: It allows to set the summary type of the field. The available types are, `Sum`: The summary cells calculated by the sum of its cells. `Count`: The summary cells calculated by the count of its cells. `Min`: The summary cells shows the value which is the minimum value of its cells. `Max`: The summary cells shows the value which is the maximum value of its cells. `Percentage`: The summary cells displays in percentage format. `Avg`: The summary cells calculated by the average of its cells. `CalculatedField`: It should set to include calculated fields.

member.summary: Defines the cell content's overflow mode. The available modes are `Clip` - Truncates the cell content when it overflows its area. `Ellipsis` - Displays ellipsis when the cell content overflows its area. `EllipsisWithTooltip` - Displays ellipsis when the cell content overflows its area also it will display tooltip while hover on ellipsis applied cell.

member.summary: Specifies the actions like `Hide`, `Rotate45`, and `Rotate90` when the axis labels intersect with each other.They are, Rotate45: Rotates the label to 45 degree when it intersects. Rotate90: Rotates the label to 90 degree when it intersects. None: Shows all the labels. Hide: Hides the label when it intersects.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.EJ2.PivotView.PivotViewPivotSelectionSettingsBuilder.CellSelectionMode(Syncfusion.EJ2.PivotView.PivotCellSelectionMode)
member.summary: The cell selection modes are flow and box. It requires the selection `mode` to be either cell or both. `Flow`: Selects the range of cells between start index and end index that also includes the other cells of the selected rows. `Box`: Selects the range of cells within the start and end column indexes that includes in between cells of rows within the range. `BoxWithBorder`: Selects the range of cells as like Box mode with borders.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.EJ2.PivotView.PivotViewPivotSelectionSettingsBuilder.CheckboxMode(System.Object)
member.summary: Defines options for checkbox selection Mode. They are `Default`: This is the default value of the checkboxMode. In this mode, user can select multiple rows by clicking rows one by one. `ResetOnRowClick`: In ResetOnRowClick mode, on clicking a row it will reset previously selected row and also multiple rows can be selected by using CTRL or SHIFT key.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.EJ2.PivotView.PivotViewPivotSelectionSettingsBuilder.CheckboxOnly(System.Boolean)
member.summary: If 'checkboxOnly' set to true, then the selection is allowed only through checkbox.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.EJ2.PivotView.PivotViewPivotSelectionSettingsBuilder.EnableSimpleMultiRowSelection(System.Boolean)
member.summary: If 'enableSimpleMultiRowSelection' set to true, then the user can able to perform multiple row selection with single clicks.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.EJ2.PivotView.PivotViewPivotSelectionSettingsBuilder.Mode(Syncfusion.EJ2.PivotView.SelectionMode)
member.summary: Pivot widget supports row, column, cell, and both (row and column) selection mode.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.EJ2.PivotView.PivotViewPivotSelectionSettingsBuilder.PersistSelection(System.Boolean)
member.summary: If 'persistSelection' set to true, then the selection is persisted on all operations. For persisting selection, any one of the column should be enabled as a primary key.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.EJ2.PivotView.PivotViewPivotSelectionSettingsBuilder.Type(System.Object)
member.summary: Defines options for selection type. They are `Single`: Allows selection of only a row or a column or a cell. `Multiple`: Allows selection of multiple rows or columns or cells.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.RichTextEditor.RichTextEditor.Height
member.summary: Specifies the height of the RichTextEditor component.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.RichTextEditor.RichTextEditor.HtmlAttributes
member.summary: Allows additional HTML attributes such as title, name, etc., and It will be accepts n number of attributes in a key-value pair format.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.RichTextEditor.RichTextEditor.IframeSettings
member.summary: Specifies the items to be rendered in an iframe mode, and it has the following properties. enable - Set Boolean value to enable, the editors content is placed in an iframe and isolated from the rest of the page. attributes - Custom style to be used inside the iframe to display content. This style is added to the iframe body. resources - we can add both styles and scripts to the iframe. 1. styles[] - An array of CSS style files to inject inside the iframe to display content 2. scripts[] - An array of JS script files to inject inside the iframe

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.RichTextEditor.RichTextEditor.InlineMode
member.summary: Enable or disable the inline edit mode. enable - set boolean value to enable or disable the inline edit mode. onSelection - If its set to true, upon selecting the text, the toolbar is opened in inline. If its set to false, upon clicking to the target element, the toolbar is opened.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.RichTextEditor.RichTextEditor.InsertImageSettings
member.summary: Specifies the image insert options in RichTextEditor component and control with the following properties. allowedTypes - Specifies the extensions of the image types allowed to insert on bowering and passing the extensions with comma separators. For example, pass allowedTypes as .jpg and .png. display - Sets the default display for an image when it is inserted in to the RichTextEditor. Possible options are: 'inline' and 'block'. width - Sets the default width of the image when it is inserted in the RichTextEditor. saveFormat - Specifies the format to store the image in the RichTextEditor (Base64 or Blob). height - Sets the default height of the image when it is inserted in the RichTextEditor. saveUrl - Provides URL to map the action result method to save the image. path - Specifies the location to store the image.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.RichTextEditor.RichTextEditor.KeyConfig
member.summary: Customizes the key actions in RichTextEditor. For example, when using German keyboard, the key actions can be customized using these shortcuts.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.RichTextEditor.RichTextEditor.Locale
member.summary: Overrides the global culture and localization value for this component. Default global culture is 'en-US'.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.RichTextEditor.RichTextEditor.MaxLength
member.summary: Specifies the maximum number of characters allowed in the RichTextEditor component.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.RichTextEditor.RichTextEditor.PasteCleanupSettings
member.summary: Specifies the pasting options in RichTextEditor component and control with the following properties. prompt - Set boolean value to enable or disable the prompt when pasting. deniedAttrs - Specifies the attributes to restrict when pasting in RTE. allowedStyleProps - Specifies the allowed style properties when pasting in RTE. deniedTags - Specifies the tags to restrict when pasting in RTE. keepFormat - Set boolean value to keep or remove the from when pasting. plainText - Set boolean value to paste as plain text or not.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.RichTextEditor.RichTextEditor.Placeholder
member.summary: Specifies the placeholder for the RichTextEditors content used when the RichTextEditor body is empty.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.RichTextEditor.RichTextEditor.QuickToolbarSettings
member.summary: Specifies the items to be rendered in quick toolbar based on the target element. It has following fields: enable - set boolean value to show or hide the quick toolbar actionOnScroll - it has two possible options 1. hide: The quickToolbar is closed when the parent element is scrolled. 2. none: The quickToolbar cannot be closed even the parent element is scrolled. link - Specifies the items to be rendered in quick toolbar based on link element such as `Open`, `Edit`, and `UnLink`. image - Specifies the items to be rendered in quick toolbar based on image element such as 'Replace', 'Align', 'Caption', 'Remove', 'InsertLink', 'Display', 'AltText', 'Dimension'. text - Specifies the items to be rendered in quick toolbar based on text element such as 'Cut', 'Copy', 'Paste'.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.RichTextEditor.RichTextEditor.Readonly
member.summary: The user interactions on the component are disabled, when set to true.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.RichTextEditor.RichTextEditor.SaveInterval
member.summary: Specifies the saveInterval in milliseconds for autosave the value. The change event will be triggered if the content was changed from the last saved interval.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.RichTextEditor.RichTextEditor.ShowCharCount
member.summary: Sets Boolean value to enable or disable the display of the character counter.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.RichTextEditor.RichTextEditor.TableSettings
member.summary: Specifies the table insert options in RichTextEditor component and control with the following properties. styles - Class name should be appended by default in table element. It helps to design the table in specific CSS styles always when inserting in editor. width - Sets the default width of the table when it is inserted in the RichTextEditor. minWidth - Sets the default minWidth of the table when it is inserted in the RichTextEditor. maxWidth - Sets the default maxWidth of the table when it is inserted in the RichTextEditor. resize - To enable resize the table.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.RichTextEditor.RichTextEditor.ToolbarSettings
member.summary: Specifies the group of items aligned horizontally in the toolbar as well as defined the toolbar rendering type. By default, toolbar is float at the top of the RichTextEditor. Whenyou scroll down, the toolbar will scroll along with the page on RichTextEditor with the specified offset value. enable: set boolean value to show or hide the toolbar. enableFloating: Set Boolean value to enable or disable the floating toolbar. Preserves the toolbar at top of the RichTextEditor on scrolling. type: it has two possible options 1. Expand: Hide the overflowing toolbar items in the next row. Click the expand arrow to view overflowing toolbar items 2. MultiRow: The toolbar overflowing items wrapped in the next row. items: Specifies the array of items aligned horizontally in the toolbar. > | and - can insert a vertical and horizontal separator lines in the toolbar. itemConfigs: Modify the default toolbar item configuration like icon class.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.RichTextEditor.RichTextEditor.UndoRedoSteps
member.summary: Specifies the count of undo history which is stored in undoRedoManager.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.EJ2.RichTextEditor.RichTextEditorBuilder.HtmlAttributes(System.Object)
member.summary: Allows additional HTML attributes such as title, name, etc., and It will be accepts n number of attributes in a key-value pair format.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.EJ2.RichTextEditor.RichTextEditorBuilder.IframeSettings(Syncfusion.EJ2.RichTextEditor.RichTextEditorIFrameSettings)
member.summary: Specifies the items to be rendered in an iframe mode, and it has the following properties. enable - Set Boolean value to enable, the editors content is placed in an iframe and isolated from the rest of the page. attributes - Custom style to be used inside the iframe to display content. This style is added to the iframe body. resources - we can add both styles and scripts to the iframe. 1. styles[] - An array of CSS style files to inject inside the iframe to display content 2. scripts[] - An array of JS script files to inject inside the iframe

member.name: M:Syncfusion.EJ2.RichTextEditor.RichTextEditorBuilder.InlineMode(Syncfusion.EJ2.RichTextEditor.RichTextEditorInlineMode)
member.summary: Enable or disable the inline edit mode. enable - set boolean value to enable or disable the inline edit mode. onSelection - If its set to true, upon selecting the text, the toolbar is opened in inline. If its set to false, upon clicking to the target element, the toolbar is opened.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.EJ2.RichTextEditor.RichTextEditorBuilder.InsertImageSettings(Syncfusion.EJ2.RichTextEditor.RichTextEditorImageSettings)
member.summary: Specifies the image insert options in RichTextEditor component and control with the following properties. allowedTypes - Specifies the extensions of the image types allowed to insert on bowering and passing the extensions with comma separators. For example, pass allowedTypes as .jpg and .png. display - Sets the default display for an image when it is inserted in to the RichTextEditor. Possible options are: 'inline' and 'block'. width - Sets the default width of the image when it is inserted in the RichTextEditor. saveFormat - Specifies the format to store the image in the RichTextEditor (Base64 or Blob). height - Sets the default height of the image when it is inserted in the RichTextEditor. saveUrl - Provides URL to map the action result method to save the image. path - Specifies the location to store the image.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.EJ2.RichTextEditor.RichTextEditorBuilder.KeyConfig(System.Object)
member.summary: Customizes the key actions in RichTextEditor. For example, when using German keyboard, the key actions can be customized using these shortcuts.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.EJ2.RichTextEditor.RichTextEditorBuilder.Locale(System.String)
member.summary: Overrides the global culture and localization value for this component. Default global culture is 'en-US'.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.EJ2.RichTextEditor.RichTextEditorBuilder.MaxLength(System.Double)
member.summary: Specifies the maximum number of characters allowed in the RichTextEditor component.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.EJ2.RichTextEditor.RichTextEditorBuilder.PasteCleanupSettings(Syncfusion.EJ2.RichTextEditor.RichTextEditorPasteCleanupSettings)
member.summary: Specifies the pasting options in RichTextEditor component and control with the following properties. prompt - Set boolean value to enable or disable the prompt when pasting. deniedAttrs - Specifies the attributes to restrict when pasting in RTE. allowedStyleProps - Specifies the allowed style properties when pasting in RTE. deniedTags - Specifies the tags to restrict when pasting in RTE. keepFormat - Set boolean value to keep or remove the from when pasting. plainText - Set boolean value to paste as plain text or not.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.EJ2.RichTextEditor.RichTextEditorBuilder.Placeholder(System.String)
member.summary: Specifies the placeholder for the RichTextEditors content used when the RichTextEditor body is empty.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.EJ2.RichTextEditor.RichTextEditorBuilder.QuickToolbarSettings(Syncfusion.EJ2.RichTextEditor.RichTextEditorQuickToolbarSettings)
member.summary: Specifies the items to be rendered in quick toolbar based on the target element. It has following fields: enable - set boolean value to show or hide the quick toolbar actionOnScroll - it has two possible options 1. hide: The quickToolbar is closed when the parent element is scrolled. 2. none: The quickToolbar cannot be closed even the parent element is scrolled. link - Specifies the items to be rendered in quick toolbar based on link element such as `Open`, `Edit`, and `UnLink`. image - Specifies the items to be rendered in quick toolbar based on image element such as 'Replace', 'Align', 'Caption', 'Remove', 'InsertLink', 'Display', 'AltText', 'Dimension'. text - Specifies the items to be rendered in quick toolbar based on text element such as 'Cut', 'Copy', 'Paste'.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.EJ2.RichTextEditor.RichTextEditorBuilder.SaveInterval(System.Double)
member.summary: Specifies the saveInterval in milliseconds for autosave the value. The change event will be triggered if the content was changed from the last saved interval.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.EJ2.RichTextEditor.RichTextEditorBuilder.ShowCharCount(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Sets Boolean value to enable or disable the display of the character counter.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.EJ2.RichTextEditor.RichTextEditorBuilder.TableSettings(Syncfusion.EJ2.RichTextEditor.RichTextEditorTableSettings)
member.summary: Specifies the table insert options in RichTextEditor component and control with the following properties. styles - Class name should be appended by default in table element. It helps to design the table in specific CSS styles always when inserting in editor. width - Sets the default width of the table when it is inserted in the RichTextEditor. minWidth - Sets the default minWidth of the table when it is inserted in the RichTextEditor. maxWidth - Sets the default maxWidth of the table when it is inserted in the RichTextEditor. resize - To enable resize the table.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.EJ2.RichTextEditor.RichTextEditorBuilder.ToolbarSettings(Syncfusion.EJ2.RichTextEditor.RichTextEditorToolbarSettings)
member.summary: Specifies the group of items aligned horizontally in the toolbar as well as defined the toolbar rendering type. By default, toolbar is float at the top of the RichTextEditor. Whenyou scroll down, the toolbar will scroll along with the page on RichTextEditor with the specified offset value. enable: set boolean value to show or hide the toolbar. enableFloating: Set Boolean value to enable or disable the floating toolbar. Preserves the toolbar at top of the RichTextEditor on scrolling. type: it has two possible options 1. Expand: Hide the overflowing toolbar items in the next row. Click the expand arrow to view overflowing toolbar items 2. MultiRow: The toolbar overflowing items wrapped in the next row. items: Specifies the array of items aligned horizontally in the toolbar. > | and - can insert a vertical and horizontal separator lines in the toolbar. itemConfigs: Modify the default toolbar item configuration like icon class.
