member.name: M:Syncfusion.EJ2.TreeGrid.TreeGridFilterSettingsBuilder.Columns(System.Object)
member.summary: Specifies the columns to be filtered at initial rendering of the TreeGrid. You can also get the columns that were currently filtered.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.EJ2.TreeGrid.TreeGridFilterSettingsBuilder.HierarchyMode(Syncfusion.EJ2.TreeGrid.FilterHierarchyMode)
member.summary: Defines the filter types. The available options are, `Parent`: Shows the filtered record with parent record. `Child`: Shows the filtered record with child record. `Both` : shows the filtered record with both parent and child record. `None` : Shows only filtered record.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.EJ2.TreeGrid.TreeGridFilterSettingsBuilder.IgnoreAccent(System.Boolean)
member.summary: If ignoreAccent set to true, then filter ignores the diacritic characters or accents while filtering.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.EJ2.TreeGrid.TreeGridFilterSettingsBuilder.ImmediateModeDelay(System.Double)
member.summary: Defines the time delay (in milliseconds) in filtering records when the `Immediate` mode of filter bar is set.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.EJ2.TreeGrid.TreeGridFilterSettingsBuilder.Mode(Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.FilterBarMode)
member.summary: Defines the filter bar modes. The available options are, `OnEnter`: Initiates filter operation after Enter key is pressed. `Immediate`: Initiates filter operation after a certain time interval. By default, time interval is 1500 ms.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.EJ2.TreeGrid.TreeGridFilterSettingsBuilder.Operators(System.Object)
member.summary: The `operators` is used to override the default operators in filter menu. This should be defined by type wise (string, number, date and boolean). Based on the column type, this customize operator list will render in filter menu.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.EJ2.TreeGrid.TreeGridFilterSettingsBuilder.ShowFilterBarStatus(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Shows or hides the filtered status message on the pager.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.EJ2.TreeGrid.TreeGridFilterSettingsBuilder.Type(Syncfusion.EJ2.TreeGrid.FilterType)
member.summary: Defines options for filtering type. The available options are `Menu` - Specifies the filter type as menu. `FilterBar` - Specifies the filter type as filterbar.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.EJ2.TreeGrid.TreeGridPageSettingsBuilder.CurrentPage(System.Double)
member.summary: Defines the current page number of the pager in TreeGrid.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.EJ2.TreeGrid.TreeGridPageSettingsBuilder.EnableQueryString(System.Boolean)
member.summary: If `enableQueryString` set to true, then it pass current page information as a query string along with the URL while navigating to other page in TreeGrid.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.EJ2.TreeGrid.TreeGridPageSettingsBuilder.PageCount(System.Double)
member.summary: Defines the number of pages to be displayed in the TreeGrid pager container.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.EJ2.TreeGrid.TreeGridPageSettingsBuilder.PageSize(System.Double)
member.summary: Defines the number of records to be displayed in TreeGrid per page.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.EJ2.TreeGrid.TreeGridPageSettingsBuilder.PageSizeMode(Syncfusion.EJ2.TreeGrid.PageSizeMode)
member.summary: Specifies the mode of record count in a page. The options are, `All`: Count all the records. `Root`: Count only zeroth level parent records.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.EJ2.TreeGrid.TreeGridPageSettingsBuilder.PageSizes(System.Object)
member.summary: If `pageSizes` set to true or Array of values, It renders DropDownList in the pager of TreeGrid which allow us to select pageSize from DropDownList.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.EJ2.TreeGrid.TreeGridPageSettingsBuilder.PageSizes(System.Boolean)
member.summary: If `pageSizes` set to true or Array of values, It renders DropDownList in the pager of TreeGrid which allow us to select pageSize from DropDownList.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.EJ2.TreeGrid.TreeGridPageSettingsBuilder.Template(System.String)
member.summary: Defines the template which renders customized elements in pager of TreeGrid instead of default elements. It accepts either [template string](../../../common/template-engine/) or HTML element ID.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.EJ2.TreeGrid.TreeGridSearchSettingsBuilder.Fields(System.String[])
member.summary: Specifies the columns to be searched at initial rendering of the TreeGrid. You can also get the columns that were currently filtered.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.EJ2.TreeGrid.TreeGridSearchSettingsBuilder.HierarchyMode(Syncfusion.EJ2.TreeGrid.FilterHierarchyMode)
member.summary: Defines the filter types. The available options are, `Parent`: Initiates filter operation after Enter key is pressed. `Child`: Initiates filter operation after a certain time interval. By default, time interval is 1500 ms.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.EJ2.TreeGrid.TreeGridSearchSettingsBuilder.IgnoreCase(System.Boolean)
member.summary: If ignoreCase set to true, then search ignores the diacritic characters or accents while filtering.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.EJ2.TreeGrid.TreeGridSearchSettingsBuilder.Key(System.String)
member.summary: A key word for searching the TreeGrid content.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.EJ2.TreeGrid.TreeGridSearchSettingsBuilder.Operator(System.String)
member.summary: Defines the operator to search records. The available operators are:

member.name: M:Syncfusion.EJ2.TreeGrid.TreeGridSelectionSettingsBuilder.CellSelectionMode(Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.CellSelectionMode)
member.summary: The cell selection modes are flow and box. It requires the selection [`mode`](#mode) to be either cell or both. `Flow`: Selects the range of cells between start index and end index that also includes the other cells of the selected rows. `Box`: Selects the range of cells within the start and end column indexes that includes in between cells of rows within the range.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.EJ2.TreeGrid.TreeGridSelectionSettingsBuilder.CheckboxMode(System.Object)
member.summary: Defines options for checkbox selection Mode. They are `Default`: This is the default value of the checkboxMode. In this mode, user can select multiple rows by clicking rows one by one. `ResetOnRowClick`: In ResetOnRowClick mode, on clicking a row it will reset previously selected row and also multiple rows can be selected by using CTRL or SHIFT key.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.EJ2.TreeGrid.TreeGridSelectionSettingsBuilder.CheckboxOnly(System.Boolean)
member.summary: If 'checkboxOnly' set to true, then the TreeGrid selection is allowed only through checkbox.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.EJ2.TreeGrid.TreeGridSelectionSettingsBuilder.Mode(Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.SelectionMode)
member.summary: TreeGrid supports row, cell, and both (row and cell) selection mode.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.EJ2.TreeGrid.TreeGridSelectionSettingsBuilder.PersistSelection(System.Boolean)
member.summary: If 'persistSelection' set to true, then the TreeGrid selection is persisted on all operations. For persisting selection in the TreeGrid, any one of the column should be enabled as a primary key.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.EJ2.TreeGrid.TreeGridSelectionSettingsBuilder.Type(Syncfusion.EJ2.Grids.SelectionType)
member.summary: Defines options for selection type. They are `Single`: Allows selection of only a row or a cell. `Multiple`: Allows selection of multiple rows or cells.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.EJ2.TreeGrid.TreeGridSortSettingsBuilder.AllowUnsort(System.Boolean)
member.summary: If `allowUnsort` set to false the user can not get the TreeGrid in unsorted state by clicking the sorted column header.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.EJ2.TreeGrid.TreeGridSortSettingsBuilder.Columns(System.Object)
member.summary: Specifies the columns to sort at initial rendering of TreeGrid. Also user can get current sorted columns.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.EJ2.TreeGrid.TreeGridTextWrapSettingsBuilder.WrapMode(Syncfusion.EJ2.TreeGrid.WrapMode)
member.summary: Defines the `wrapMode` of the TreeGrid. The available modes are: `Both`: Wraps both the header and content. `Content`: Wraps the header alone. `Header`: Wraps the content alone.
